About the Company: Satya Miners & Transporters Ltd is originally incorporated as "Satya Investments Limited" on 12th December 1975 in the state of West Bengal. Subsequently its name changed to "Satya Miners & Transporters Limited" in 1986. They are registered as a Non-Banking Finance Company with Reserve Bank of India and is mainly engaged in financing and investments as its principal business. The Equity shares of the Company is listed on Calcutta Stock Exchange. Presently the registered office of the Company is situated in the state of West Bengal.
